title: En ipparAmukhamO
sahitya:
En ipparAmukhamO EzhaiyiDattil enna unakku kOpamO karuNaikkaDalE


anupallavi

  nAn sheida pizhai enna navinriDuvIr shaTrE


caraNam 1    bandha vilangugaLil paTTuk-koLLAmalE aintozhil purindiDum indrajAlanE
    caraNam 2    nETru varaiyil ennaip-pOTruvadAga shollik-kATril viDuttuk-kambi nITTa vazhi pArkkirIr
    caraNam 3    piDittup-piDittum pAdam vaDittu vaDittu kaNNIr paDittup-paDitten anbaik-koDutta payan iduvO
